item.title: Sorry, Mr. President: If You Want Tariffs, You Need Congress
item.description: Trump’s claim that he can enact global tariffs unilaterally is constitutionally dubious.

item.title: What Are We Going to Do About Abortion?
item.description: In the third year since the end of Roe , let’s stop wasting time.

item.title: The Folly of an ‘Interim’ Agreement with Iran
item.description: It would neither produce long-term stability nor bring about Iranian nuclear disarmament.

item.title: Medicaid Reform Falls Short for People with Disabilities
item.description: The Senate should include reforms to ensure that the program can return to its original purpose of supporting the most vulnerable.

item.title: A Flawed Portrait of Bill Buckley
item.description: Sam Tanenhaus deserves credit for the care he took in the research and writing, but the epic biography is blighted by his hobbyhorses.
